subtitle: STRUCTURED MANDATE INQUIRIES
introText: For partnership discussions, market entry collaboration, sourcing pathways, or cross-border commercial opportunities, contact our team.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us what you're trying to achieve and which market(s) you are targeting.
form.successMessage: Your inquiry has been submitted. Our team will respond within 48 business hours.
form.errorMessage: Submission failed. Please try again or contact us directly by email.

privacyNotice: By submitting this form, you consent to confidential handling of institutional information in accordance with applicable data protection requirements.
